title: MoveUp - Level Up as You Move
creator: finish()

extendedInfo.description: MoveUp takes a unique approach to a pedometer, allowing you to gain levels and experience points based on how much you move around.  It features a simple and clean interface paired with easy to understand leveling, making the app a fun and intuitive experience for all ages.  Whether you want to get back in shape or simply see how high you can get your level, MoveUp is the application for you!You move every day, but will you MoveUp?(This app will not be active when minimized in order to prevent unnecessary accelerometer usage)
